Class FtpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ.lille1.ftp.util.FtpUtils

  • public class FtpUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    FtpUtils is an utility class which contains all utility methods for the FTP server

    1.0
    Author:
    Quentin Warnant

      • extractArgumentFromCommandLine

        public static FtpPath extractArgumentFromCommandLine(java.lang.String commandLine,
                                                     java.lang.String currentDirectory)
        This method returns the ftp path object associated to the incoming command line from the client
        Parameters:
        commandLine - String the requested command line from the ftp client
        currentDirectory - String the current ftp server directory
        Returns:
        FtpPath the ftp path object

      • refactorPath

        public static java.lang.String refactorPath(java.lang.String currentPath)
        This method returns the request path without any redundancy ".." or "." in the local path
        Parameters:
        currentPath - String the requested path
        Returns:
        String the new refactored local path

      • listFilesInFolder

        public static java.lang.String listFilesInFolder(java.io.File folder,
                                                 boolean recursive,
                                                 boolean verbose)
        This method returns the file sub-list of the current folder file
        Parameters:
        folder - File the current folder
        recursive - boolean true if the search must be recursive, false otherwise
        verbose - boolean true if all information of the file must be gotten, false otherwise
        Returns:
        String the file sub-list

        Parameters:
        commandName - String the requested command name with args
        Returns:
        String the output of the command processing

      • deleteFilesInFolder

        public static int deleteFilesInFolder(java.io.File folder)
        This method deletes recursively all the sub-files of the requested directory
        Parameters:
        folder - File the requested folder
        Returns:
        int the deleted file count
